summary: This bill, the "Fighting Illicit Goods, Helping Trustworthy Importers, and Netting Gains for America Act of 2025," aims to increase transparency and enforcement related to low-value imports entering the United States, particularly those utilizing the de minimis exemption. It mandates new documentation requirements for such shipments, allows for summary forfeiture of goods imported contrary to law, increases penalties for violations, and directs several reports to Congress regarding the use and impact of the exemption. It also institutes a $2 customs user fee per shipment under the de minimis exemption.
